articles.description: Compass Heli Tours, an adventure outfitter based near Vancouver, Canada, takes guests on a four-hour heli-kayaking trip of a lifetime. The tour, which doesn't come cheap, includes kayaking, stand-up paddleboarding and fishing -- amid melting glaciers.
